content:
Hello!
I'm new to FHIR and dug through the documentation. Can anyone point me to the right place where to store/retrieve patient-ventilation data?
Thanks!

This question was already asked here: http://community.fhir.org/t/patient-ventilation-data/2101

As per FHIR's rules on asking questions, please don't raise the same question in multiple places simultaneously. Give the community a couple of days to respond first. (As a rule, you'll typically get a response faster here.)
Ok, thank you - I wasnt sure if this platforms are related :)
And sorry for violating the FHIR's rules on aksing questions - Wasn't aware of them.
